name: Rolling Atop It
description: A ball rolling game of epic proportions! Good music, higher-skill gameplay, and enough different rolling mechanics that we might go out of business!

name: EA Sports FC 24: Ultimate Edition
description: We welcomes you to The World's Game: the most true-to-football experience ever with HyperMotionV, PlayStyles optimised by Opta, and a revolutionised Frostbite Engine.

name: Avatar: The Last Airbender - Quest for Balance
description: In Avatar: The Last Airbender - Quest for Balance you'll be playing as one of nine characters - Aang, Toph, Sokka, and Katara are all confirmed - utilizing the four elements (earth, wind, fire, and water) to solve puzzles.

name: Truck Driver: The American Dream
description:
Truck Driver: The American Dream is a truck-driving simulation game that is setting out to mix storytelling.

Start from the bottom and work your way to the top in the name of getting your life together and chasing the American Dream.

name: Cry Babies: Magic Tears - The Big Game
description: Your favourite Cry Babies characters are ready to play! The Big Game is a friendly and fun adventure perfect for young players. Join Lady, Coney, Dreamy and friends in an all-new adventure as they take part in an exciting multi-stage tournament to win the fabled Golden Pacifier!

name: Missiles Away
description: Humanity faces its darkest hour as an alien force launches a relentless invasion. As a skilled pilot, you must take control of a powerful combat helicopter and engage in a fast-paced, high-octane first-person shooter experience.

name: ArcRacer
description: ArcRacer is a fast-paced, aggressive, and stylistic anti-gravity racer. Inspired by classic series such as F-Zero and WipEout, ArcRacer aims to provide a fresh new challenge for genre veterans, while also creating an accessible and engaging experience for newcomers.

name: Cartel Tycoon: San Rafaela
description: San Rafaela is a vast new map featuring ferry routes, stunning landmarks, and an immersive storyline! The destiny of San Rafaela lies in your hands!

name: Endless Apocalypse
description: Endless Apocalypse is a thrilling shooter game that takes you on a never-ending journey through different levels. Unlike zombie games, it features a unique set of enemies and bosses that require your quick reflexes and careful planning to defeat.

name: Bud Spencer & Terence Hill: Slaps and Beans 2
description: The second chapter of the official video game of Bud Spencer and Terence Hill

name: StormEdge: Wind of Change
description: Discover the origins of the Elemental Tempests in the StormEdge: Wind of Change, the prequel to the main game, StormEdge. Uncover the cause of the magical disturbance in the world.

name: Human Multiplayer Game
description: An experimental multiplayer puzzle game made entirely by AI. Normally you would need a computer to play video games; It's about time you returned the favor.

name: Life Is Not Auto
description: Life Is Not Auto is a rhythm + survival based timing game. You manually control the organs to keep your character alive until life ends.

name: Touhou Artificial Dream in Arcadia
description: Inspired by Megami Tensei and Etrian Odyssey, Artificial Dream in Arcadia is an old-school dungeon crawler featuring Sumireko Usami in her quest to solve an incident which she seems to be personally responsible for...

name: Dungeon Dungeon!
description: Dungeon Dungeon! is a turn-based RPG with roguelike elements and a loot system. Recruit companions, upgrade skills, collect loot and build up your team to conquer the dungeons!

name: Empyreal Dawn
description: Empyreal Dawn is a Gothic Fantasy Adventure where you lead a party named Caeruleum. Together with your Swordsmaiden partner, Alice Starwell, undertake your first steps toward becoming legendary heroes! Featuring professional voice acting, an original soundtrack, and more!

name: Isekai Janken Hero
description: The player plays an unemployed man who travels to the other world, where the goddess grants him magical powers and embarks on a journey to save the world... But there seems to be some secret behind this?

name: The Events at Unity Farm
description: Horror, fantasy and a dash of steampunk, EVENTS AT UNITY FARM is a fresh take on Open World VR. Use your ancestral power to cast spells, overcome undead evils and merciless bosses. Gather and craft potions, search for clues to solve puzzles all to stop the impending Multipocalypse.

name: The Bunny Graveyard
description: An episodic puzzle adventure about a bunny who seeks to find the horrifying truth behind her existence.

name: Seedlings
description: Immerse yourself in nature as a sentient seed in this relaxing award-winning 2.5D puzzle platformer. Possess different plant creatures with unique abilities and find your way through the New Zealand native forest, made using real photos and videos.

name: Code Bunny
description:
The planet of Lumna is threatened by a group of terrorists called Mad Bunny! Join Axel and Hazel on their mission to fight them, as they discover more about the world and its people, in this fast-paced 2D-action platformer!

Code Bunny is a momentum-based, melee-oriented platformer where the action is nonstop! Master both character's play styles to deliver flashy and exciting attacks that rip and bounce through enemies and levels!

name: Junkworld
description:
Jump into the wasteland and prepare for mayhem!

Lead your gang of scavengers through a dry, barren desert and radioactive swamp in an action-packed battle for survival. Use your strategic mastery to bring down the tyrannical regime of this devastated world. Test your wits with an array of upgradable towers and clever tactics to push your foes back and move forward on your path to victory!

Discover the best combinations, bring them into battle, and use your customized arsenal to destroy your enemies! Place your defenses wherever you want and efficiently manage them to bring the foes down with each tower's special skills.

name: Pray Game
description: A classic style turn-based RPG. Play as Arcee, a young woman who's home mysteriously gets teleported to an island. Now she works to discover what happened, and find her way back home.

name: Costcodle
description: Guess the COSTCODLE in 6 tries. Each guess must be a valid price. Incorrect guesses will help guide you to the target price. If you guess within 5% of the target price, you win! A new COSTCODLE is available every day!

name: Down Under
description: 12 speed-mapped Boom compatible levels (-cl 9) restricted to 500 linedefs (except for map12). Explore a desert base and the centre of the Earth with a banging soundtrack drawn from various Sonic games.

name: Blades of Light & Shadow II
description: Blades of Light and Shadow, Book 2 is the second book of the Blades of Light and Shadow series. It succeeds its first book, Blades of Light and Shadow, Book 1.

name: The Milk is Sour
description: a glimpse into a future

name: Pokémon: Too Many Types
description: Released as a rom-hack of Pokemon Emerald, Pokemon Too Many Types adds multiple types like Sus, Furry, Sharp,Magic, Gamer and more along with returning pokemon from future generations like Poplio. And whole new moves using the new types.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: John Riccitiello Pack
description:
A parody mod that adds the Unity civilization with its Leader John Riccitello.
Playing as him gives you:

- Unique neighborhood district (Microtransactions Store)
- Unique unit (Data Analyst)
- Changes how great architects work for everyone on the match
- Develops a unique system of obtaining gold via total number of civilizations met
- And much more!

name: Midnight Lights
description: Midnight Lights is a first-person person horror walking sim where you find yourself trapped in a national park with a creature who hunts you by disguising itself as street signs.

name: Bulanci
description: Bulanci is an action multiplayer and easy-to-play party game where you take pillow fights with your frenemies to the next level. Make your sleepless nights memorable by being fluffy and deadly!

name: Lorraine
description:
"Attend the tale of the diabolical widow, as she pondered and planned the next to be stabbed..."

Lorraine is a bite-sized, blood-curdling, bone-chilling, narrative-driven graphic adventure about a desperate widow in a preternatural situation.

name: Metroidvania Bundle
description: 2 in 1 PolarityFlow Metroidvania Bundle including GINSHA and Cryogear

name: Haunted Zombie Slaughter 2
description: Part 2 of a single player top down game with a story about escaping zombies to survive! Play co-op with up to 2 players!

name: Samurai: Japan Warrior Fighter
description: Samurai: Japan Warrior Fighter is an exhilarating action-adventure game that immerses players in the captivating world of feudal Japan. Assume the role of a young and determined samurai on a quest to master the art of the katana.

name: Metaball: Gold Bundle
description: 8 rare outfits, 1 stamp, 1 emote, 500 Metanium, 30 beam shards, and more! The Gold Bundle is a great value! Don't miss out on this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!

name: Metaball: Diamond Bundle
description: 7 Epic Outfits, 1 Stamp, 1 Emote, 1 Metapass Premium, 1000 Metanium, 30 Beamshards, and more! Get the Diamond Bundle at an affordable price! A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, don't miss it!

name: Puppet Master: Full Moon Toys - Totem & Mephisto Skins
description: After years of experiments, Andre Toulon has created puppets that want to play with you! Play the game in style with skins inspired by the hot 90s action figure toy line. Includes skins for Totem Sutekh and Mephisto!

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D.: The Bear of Wall Street Bundle
description:
This pack includes:

• Nikolai "Deadhead" Orlov hero unlock
• "Oligarch" outfit
• "Gzhel" HK UMP45 skin
• 700 Crowns.

name: Arcade Archives: Strike Gunner
description:
"STRIKE GUNNER" is a shooter released by ATHENA in 1991.
Manipulate the "S.T.G. Strike Gunner" and challenge the aliens to a battle to recapture the earth!
Select from a total of 10 weapon unit types to find one for each stage, with each weapon unit usable for one stage only.

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - Thomas Built Buses Bus Pack
description: Back to school, again! The Thomas Built Bus Pack is here to expand your school bus fleet with a well-crafted and iconic new model. Get your hands on the Saf-T-Liner C2 as well as four new interior designs for you to customize your buses.

name: Metaball: Starter Pack
description: 7 Legendary Outfits, 1 Stamp, 1 Emote, 2 Style Slots, 2 Perk Pages, and up to 30 Beam Shards! This Starter Pack is a great value! A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, don't miss it!

name: Ride 5: King of the Hills Pack
description: With RIDE 5 - King of the Hills Pack you'll have the ideal bikes available to let loose to the max on Stelvio's hairpins!

name: Bulanci: Map Pack
description: Have you played some maps too much? No worries! Before you can create your own battlefields in the editor, we've prepared another pack of sophisticated battle arenas for Deathmatch and Capture The Flag for you. This will certainly keep you busy for a time.

name: Bulanci: Hero Factory
description: The Hero Factory, where you can choose the right pattern and colour for your Bulanci. You can highlight the nature of your killer pillow with sunglasses, an eyepatch, a baseball cap, or leather gloves, to name but a few.

name: Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles: Ancient Empires
description: Long-lost civilizations are rumoured to live on in the deepest, darkest rainforests. Many intrepid explorers have attempted expeditions into these uncharted lands, but none have yet lived to tell the tale.

name: Fragment's Note 2+
description: This is the story of the future.

name: Magic Donut Adventure: Line Match 3 Puzzle
description: Match 3 is a popular puzzle game in which you have to be careful and connect all donuts three in a row with a line!

name: Bro Falls Deluxe
description: Bro Falls is an asymmetric massively multiplayer party game with chaotic elements, trap activations, and big Falls.

name: Tentacle Prawn: (Actually) A Cthulhu Dating Sim - The Myth & Legend of Marauder Shields
description: New story content! Two new Magnusball co-captains!

name: Resident Evil 4: The Mercenaries - Separate Ways Update
description:
A free update for The Mercenaries mode released alongside the Separate Ways expansion that added 4 new characters and the Docks stage, unlocked after beating the Island stage once.

Ada Wong is available by default while Albert Wesker is unlocked with an A rank on any stage using Ada. The update also added 2 variant characters with Leon (Pinstripe) and Ada (Dress) unlocked with an S rank or higher on all stages using their base character.

name: Plant Therapy: Queens
description: Plant Therapy: Queens is full of new content to make your cozy Plant Therapy experience even more plantastic! Features a new apartment with stunning city views, new plants and artwork and upgraded watering can and fertilizer options.

name: Resident Evil 4: Separate Ways
description:
The mission requires secrecy. Failure is not an option.

Play as Ada Wong in this additional scenario and experience the events of Resident Evil 4 from her perspective, filling in unanswered questions posed in the main story.

In addition to the action available in the base game with Leon, a grappling gun can be used to get to various locations, as well as take down enemies from a distance and launch a ranged melee attack. This allows for a more exciting and fast-paced gameplay experience.

name: Super Paul World
description: Experience a great adventure in "Super Paul World" where you defeat many enemies while trying to retrieve the Cookie Nexus Core for Baker Tim. Earn experience points (EXP) to acquire various cosmetic items.

name: Super Retro Rec League Racing
description: Race against the clock in Super Retro Rec League Racing! Perfect your lines, optimize every turn, time your pits, and push yourself to absolute mastery.

name: Guilty: Ashlar
description: This is an easy to get started role-playing, adventure and exploration single player game that tells the exciting story of several criminals who experience adventures in a desolate and forbidden world.

name: The Expanse: A Telltale Series - Episode 5: Europa's Folly
description: Immerse yourself in the role of Camina Drummer, the Executive Officer aboard the Artemis, a scavenging ship hunting for a big score in the outer regions of the Belt. You must corral a crew rife with tense relationships and powerful personalities, and make tough decisions that will decide everyone’s fate.

name: Relight The Dark
description: Relight The Dark is a short horror experience about a girl living with her abusive mother. After finding some dark secrets about her mother, the girl has to find a way to escape the house and get to safety.

name: Jackpot 3
description: Jackpot 3 is a casual game. Before starting the game, you need to bet first. After the bet, the small ball will start to turn again. When the small ball stops on a certain number, that number is the winning number.

name: Survivors
description: Travel through an unknown alien world, collecting new weapons to fight alien monsters and upgrading the Time Tank to withstand hordes of unknown monsters.

name: Alien
description: 'Alien' is a cartoon style 2D platform jumping type game. Players need to control their characters to avoid the enemy and finally reach the end to win.

name: Froggin' Around
description: A little frog in a little pond eatin' bugs, takin' naps, and just froggin' around.

name: Hentai Maya
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Jewel Match Atlantis Solitaire 4: Collector's Edition
description: Immerse yourself in the enchanting depths of the mystical underwater realm of Atlantis Solitaire! Delve into numerous intricate underwater levels and build stunning aquatic landscapes. Tackle the latest Supersize, Challenge, and Match-2 levels as you unlock a multitude of new solitaire variations.

name: Duskborn
description: Duskborn is a 3rd-person rouge-like game. Descend into the Abyss as fast as possible, level up by defeating various enemies, collect and combine items to upgrade your player. Maneuver through the Abyss with your jetpack and grappling hook. The race against time is on.

name: Aireo FlightSimulator
description: Are you ready for takeoff? Fasten your seatbelt and experience what it's like to be a pilot as you dive into the most breathtaking landscapes of this planet.

name: Terminal Theatre Soft
description: Probably as long as a place buries a corpse, it will really bind a living person.I would look back without hesitation, because when we walked together through the cold and wet mansion, I saw all the lives we spent together, and in the last moment, I chose to remember.

name: Livestream 2: Escape from Togaezuka Happy Place
description: Can you escape the horror of being hunted down...? The sequel to the survival horror game "Livestream: Escape from Hotel Izanami" is now available!

name: Celbugs
description: A colour-matching puzzle game in which you breed cute critters - Celbugs - and use them to beat levels.

name: Cyberpunk 2077: 2.0 Update
description:
Update 2.0 introduces a free overhaul of the game’s core mechanics. Said overhauls include a new cyberware system, which correlates V’s armor stats to your equipped cyberware rather than your clothing. This offers a greater degree of expression alongside stat-based boosts and debuffs depending on your layout; a new perks system that introduces the ability to deflect bullets, dash in mid-air, and a variety of finishing moves; and an all-new skill tree associated with the Relic chip embedded in V’s body, which only further supercharges your various abilities.

Update 2.0 also brings an introduction of a brand-new vehicular combat system, allowing V to ride shotgun and hack nearby vehicles while in-transit to inflict carnage on any would-be assailants. The introduction of vehicular combat comes with an overhaul to the game’s “wanted” system, allowing various tiers of the NCPD to give chase until they finally throw the big guns at you: The heavily-armored and highly lethal MaxTac Psycho Squad.

Cyberpunk 2077's 2.0 Update also comes with over 100 new items, ranging from new weapons, to new pieces of clothing, to new Cyberware, to new vehicles.

name: The Faceless Ones
description: Four of the most capable warriors in the Kingdom of Abrujah are about to commence a journey that will change their lives forever, if they fail, the world is doomed!

name: Lighthouse Simulator
description: Stay at the lighthouse on this uninhabited island for ten days to win $100000, would you like to? You are alone, there is nothing to do, the only thing you have to do is to endure the isolation and loneliness, this may be a hell suffering, or a life of self-imposed exile

name: Wolf West
description: Follow Luna's vengeance journey to defeat the sheriff and bring back the forest balance. Accompanied by the Druid, explore and fight the world of the Wild West in the name of your fallen brothers and sisters.

name: Marionette Eden Breakers
description: Defeat monsters approaching the heriones! 「Marionette Eden Breakers」 features cute heroines in a Hack-and-Slash action game. Defeat lots of monsters and have some lewd "communications" with the heroines...

name: Plant Therapy
description: An unapologetically cozy plant collecting and decorating game. Build a beautiful indoor garden from the ground up in your New York City apartment.

name: Selfish Cupid
description: Ten has the ability to see other people's soulmates after he was chosen to be the cupid's vessel. He is tasked to help bring couples together. But there is just one problem... Ten couldn't care less about other people's relationships. He only cares about his own love life.

name: Grapploteer
description: A puzzle platformer about a defect robot where you grapple from wall to wall and escape the factory. Pixel art graphics and many music tracks. Head through factories, sewers, trash dumps and cities to find freedom.

name: Wonder Wars
description: Wonder Wars is a strategy mobile-first videogame. Choose your hero and six troops and conquer Mundo Maravilla! Go PVP or PVE and collect all characters to create the best team.

name: Days of Doom
description: Gather your heroes and fight to make it to Sanctuary in this tactical RPG roguelite. Did we mention the zombies, raiders, and mysterious monstrosities that inhabit this post-apocalyptic wasteland? Welcome to the world of Days of Doom.

name: Telenet Shooting Collection
description:
Welcome to Shooter's paradise.
Telenet Japan Wolf Team's greatest hits return!

name: Liberation
description: Fight back against the evil Galactic Federation! It'll be good for humanity and probably OK for you.

name: Rainbow High: Runway Rush
description: Play as the Rainbow High girls, explore the school and use their unique talents to complete your first art assignment. #LetYourTrueColorsShine

name: Hungry Adventurer
description: Help hungry ninjas survive their starvation and face various enemies in this foodnastic platformer! Are you ready to collect some food? Be careful food is very addictive!

name: Raids Inc.
description: I fused different RPG mechanics trying to bring something fresh to the gaming community. Сlimb the bizarre towers! Fight with fascinating monsters! Loot! Gain experience! Upgrade your abilities and skills!

name: Airship: Kingdoms Adrift
description: Customize and manage your fleet of airships, plan trade routes, establish industries, explore the vast sky of Europa in the time of turmoil and national conflicts. Airship: Kingdoms Adrift is strategy-simulation game with rich lore and captivating story to explore. Also featuring online PvP mode.

name: CarX Street
description: Get behind the wheel and explore the large city and its surroundings, from busy city streets to spiral mountain roads and mesmerizing coastal highways. Drift, speed, traffic; be the best & challenge other players in real network races.

name: Osyaberi! Horijyo! Gekihori: Anna Holinski Saves the Universe, Alright?!
description: Spiral into the galaxy to save the world’s treasures – alone or with a friend!

name: Super Adventure Hand
description: It’s the world’s most adventurous hand! You play as a hand on a gripping handventure, a quest, a calling, through a strange and dangerous world. And in the end figure out why your beloved arm has left you.

name: Expedition Agartha
description: Expedition Agartha is a hardcore multiplayer First Person Looter Survival game. Explorers and Mercenaries from around the world find themselves on a mysterious island in the Lost Continent of Mu. Launch your expedition, encounter ruthless enemies, and discover the secrets of Agartha.

name: Paperman: Adventure Delivered
description: Explore colorful worlds, uncover secrets, and collect all golden letters in this 3D collectathon platformer. Go on an adventure with Paperman and the team, find the lost mail and defeat the greedy dragon!

name: Rise of the White Sun
description: Rise of the White Sun is one of the deepest political simulator set in the Chinese Warlord era. Play as every significant faction of 1920’s China : the Guomindang, the Chinese Communist Party, the Warlords and even the masters of the underworld - the Green Gang.

name: Evolings
description: Optain cute creatures! Evolve! Battle!

name: Astrea: Six-Sided Oracles
description: An all new dice-deck-building roguelike, Astrea, has you chart a path through the ruins of a lost civilization as one of six brave Oracles. Using an ever-changing deck of dice and enchanted Sentinels, Purify waves of Corrupted foes and a decayed goddess to save the Star System. Choose among hundreds of different dice that suit your penchant; reliably safe, perfectly balanced, or powerfully risky. Tactfully wield an innate risk vs reward system by pacifying enemies through Purification, or Corrupt yourself to unleash abilities that help tip the scales. Laden with bountiful boons to enhance your chances for success and encounters against waves of enemies that impede your progress, chart a course through the ruins of a lost civilization to the source of Corruption.

name: Hellsweeper VR
description: From the makers of Sairento VR comes a first person action-combat game that descends you into hell. In Hellsweeper VR you traverse the demonic dimensions, wield weapons with deadly precision, command the forces of telekinesis and muster mystical powers to wipe out your twisted enemies. Reap your rewards, upgrade your skills, and choose your fate as you experiment with unique combat variations and start to discover what being a Hellsweeper means to you.

name: Frag: Pro Shooter
description: Stop hiding start fragging!

name: Payday 3
description: Payday 3 is the much anticipated sequel to one of the most popular co-op shooters ever. Since its release, Payday-players have been reveling in the thrill of a perfectly planned and executed heist. That’s what makes Payday a high-octane, co-op FPS experience without equal. Step out of retirement back into the life of crime in the shoes of the Payday Gang, the envy of their peers and the nightmare of law-enforcement wherever they go. Several years after the crew’s reign of terror over Washington DC has ended, they assemble once again to deal with the threat that roused them out of early retirement.

name: The Billionaire's Baby
description: The Billionaire's Baby is the first and only book of the The Billionaire's Baby series.

name: Zoids Wild Arena
description:
Trading card game that features of the characters from the ZOIDS WILD franchise.

ZOIDS WILD ARENA is a trading card game (TCG) that incorporates units from the ZOIDS WILD franchise as cards. The game allows players to form a deck using 30 cards, which will allow them to battle against each other for supremacy. Every card can be upgraded all the way to 6 stars, so everyone has a chance to build powerful decks without relying on luck. Test your wits against others all over the world!

name: Super Dash
description: Sin descripción

name: PolyBoy War
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Bird
description: Flappy bird clone for Playdate

name: Party Animals: Deluxe Edition
description:
Purchase the Deluxe Edition to receive the following exclusive content:
- Nemo Bucks*1300
- Bathrobe Harry Outfit & Avatar & Frame
- Bathrobe Coco Outfit & Avatar & Frame
- Bathrobe Garfat Outfit & Avatar & Frame
- Golden Nemo Skin & Avatar
- Golden Macchiato Skin & Avatar
- Golden Coco Skin & Avatar

name: Truck Simulator Driver 2023: Europe Cargo
description: Sin descripción

name: Circle Dodge
description: Go around the circle dodge the bullets and collect diamonds to increase your score!

name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 2 - Steampunk Costume Pack
description: The sequel to the captivating tale of Fuga: Melodies of Steel has arrived! This turn-based RPG is back with a ramped up battle system for more strategy, as well as a brand new event system that gives you more thrilling choices to affect your experience!

name: Cardfight!!: Additional Card Set Vol.6 [D-BT09] - Dragontree Invasion
description: Unlock cards from [D-BT09]: Dragontree Invasion.The booster pack will be added to the in-game shop, and included cards will be available for crafting.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Ten Days of Autumn Campaign
description: This campaign shows the actions of 3./JG 52 it the end of October 1941.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Lisunov Li-2 Collector Plane
description: Li-2 was a Soviet C-47 sibling armed to the teeth.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Hell Hawks Over the Bulge Campaign
description: History books called them the "Hell Hawks", the USAAF called them as the 365th Fighter Group, the Germans called them a terror.

name: Claustrophobic Nights
description: Claustrophobic Nights is a recreation of Crawlspace 2 in the style of FNaF Help Wanted with multiplayer included. In the game, you crawl through tight spaces and solve various puzzles whilst evading animatronics in order to beat the night.

name: OMSI 2: Hohenkirchen
description: Welcome to the Hohenkirchen expansion for OMSI 2 - Experience the diversity of Thuringia with this add-on in an OMSI map that has been deliberately optimised for a fluid gaming experience!

name: Sex Story: Cuckold Life - Episode 7
description: A steamy Visual Novel featuring realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor. The story continues with Nikki and her husband meeting her boss for a live cuckolding experience. Will Adam enjoy being dominated by the guy who fucks his wife? Follow their Sex Story and find out!

name: Moonstone Island: Delightful Little Comforts
description: Get the Delightful Little Comforts DLC Pack to add a little sparkle to Moonstone Island

name: Final Exerion
description: Call on CELLs, change your weapon, and shoot however you want!

name: Escape Room Bundle Triple Pack
description:
Three escape rooms developed by mc2games are included!
Between Time, Regular Factory, and Wizardry School.

name: Frontier Hunter: Hairstyle Pack
description: After the empire invented the airship, people finally became able to fly across float continents and islands.Erza leads an exploration team to explore the savage frontier where the empire can’t reach. When they break through all difficulties and reaches the destination, what awaits them is...

name: Suck It!
description: Grab that vacuum! Suck items in order to grow larger and battle others in this fast paced multiplayer game!

name: Milu Milan
description: Milu Milan is a casual game of architectural maze exploration and puzzle solving.

name: Unparalleled
description: This is a wonderful little game.

name: Bobble Bash
description: It is a tabletop point collection game, where players bash their way between obstacles to score and win. Think shuffleboard meets bumper cars. Apart of Discord's in-game activity collection.

name: Pawafuru Puroyakyu: Eikan Nine Crossroad
description:
Eikan Nine is a mode in which you become a high school baseball coach, train your team, and lead them to the Koshien Japan National High School Baseball Tournament.

Powerful Pro Baseball Eikan Nine Crossroad retains the traditional Eikan Nine setup, but adds new elements for even deeper team building, including “Scholarship Students,” “Growth Board,” and “Rival Schools.”

name: Listen
description: There is no interface, it's all sound. The biggest feature of "Listen" is that there is no screen display throughout the process, and everything is entered by the keyboard and mouse movement.

name: RegicideX
description: RegicideX is a 3D Hack'n Slash that takes place in a dark fantasy world plagued with rotten and evil angels and possesed people who have invaded the castle of our Lord. You will have to fight in order to liberate your castle and overcome the invasion.

name: Pixels
description: Pixels is the new way of pixel battles. Share your art to the world on a huge canvas.

name: Balloon Chase Journey
description: A cute art style, 2D scroll casual action adventure game, you need to play animals flying in the air on a balloon, fight and trample the balloons of others to win. You will see diverse natural scenery, face unknown challenges, start a joyous adventure, bring back the balloon fight fun of childhood.

name: Rooms
description: You have found yourself in unexplained circumstances in an endless building with no apparent way out. Traverse through 100 rooms filled with monsters and puzzles and uncover the secrets of this building.

name: King of Avalon
description: Summon your Dragon and be the King of Frost and Flame in Avalon!

name: Adventurer Farmer: Save my Son!
description: Use the dynamics of movement with the rope to take the character to the rescue of his son, who accidentally fell out of the plane, while traveling from the farm to the city. Take advantage of the boosts provided by the physics on the map and stay away from dangerous obstacles. Save the farmer's son!

name: Logic
description: Logic is a 3D logical platform game, where you can get through the levels by solving several different puzzles with the help of moveable cubes, by switching buttons and pressure plates, and by using elevators and teleporting platforms.

name: Leafy Trails: Magic Tree
description: Immerse yourself in a world of enchantment and renewal as you guide the fox on its quest to rescue the ancient Great Tree. Unearth the magic of the forest, uncover its hidden gems, and weave your own story amidst the Leafy Trails.

name: Vasilisas Torment
description: Pass all the tests to free the soul of Vasilisa. But will you be able to do it and will you have enough skills to overcome the ingenious traps that the evil spirits set up.

name: Castle Empire
description: Unleash your strategic prowess

name: At Light Speed
description: An extremely challenging 3D platformer. After crash landing, you must find your way home through an obscenely dangerous asteroid belt. This world is filled with massive jump challenges, all to be completed on just one life.

name: Happy Mask
description: A colorful adventure puzzle world with underlying psychological elements meant to challenge the mental fortitude of the player.

name: The Inner Demons
description: The Inner Demons is the first game in a new genre of “Cinematically Cut Games”. Explore a horror environment through a cinematic lens in this innovative interactive experience.

name: Meat and Metal
description: You are the operator of a combat turret defending the border beyond which lies the last human city!

name: Jubeat Beyond the Ave.
description: Upgraded version of Jubeat Ave.

name: Stress Chess
description: "The real chess was the friends we made along the way." - Randy Mc'Chess

name: Tiny Man's Revenge
description: Tim Martin shrugs off his loss of height but cries over his lost soup. He embarks on an epic adventure in an innocent, yet sinister man's house, using his skills in Gliding, Climbing, and Dodging to steal everything he can. With his haul, he hopes to afford his beloved soup once again.

name: My Pet Hooligan
description: Rebel against the evil overlord Metazuckbot by wreaking havoc on Hooliland City. Fight each other, destroy stuff, skateboard like a pro-skater, graffiti the buildings, or just hang out with friends. Playing the way you want is what it means to be a Hooligan.

name: Jumpah
description: Take the title for the fastest Jumpah alive, and in the process make your friends hate their lives! Parkour, Rage, anger, frustration, disappointment, despair, depression, and lots of colors! What more could you ask for?

name: Pyramid Curse
description: Explore the tunnels of a mysterious underground pyramid.

name: Bog Roll
description: The year's 2020 and during the peak of Australia's lockdown there's a toilet roll (or bog roll) shortage. You play as Jim, who of course always leaves things to the last minute and forgot to stock up on bog rolls. Collect as many bog rolls as you on this whirlwind adventure!

name: Renfield: Bring Your Own Blood
description: Slash and survive a typical workday as Dracula's overworked and underappreciated servant! You'll have a bloody good time as you rampage through New Orleans to find fresh victims for your narcissistic boss.

name: Moonstone Island
description:
Moonstone Island is a creature-collecting life-sim set in an open world with 100 islands to explore. Make friends, brew potions, collect Spirits, and test your strength in card-based encounters to complete your Alchemy training!

Spend a year away from home on an island in the sky! Following your village's tradition, you must move to an island in the sky to complete your Alchemy training. Armed with a team of nature spirits, magical potions, and the support of your new friends, you'll explore ancient temples, dangerous dungeons, and hostile biomes to uncover the dark secret of Moonstone Island.

name: Warhaven
description: Warhaven is a free-to-play, big team PVP medieval-fantasy warfare game. Choose your soldier, lead your squad into combat, and incarnate as a powerful Immortal to turn the tide of war!

name: Party Animals
description: Fight your friends as puppies, kittens and other fuzzy creatures in PARTY ANIMALS! Paw it out with your friends remotely, or huddle together for chaotic fun on the same screen. Interact with the world under our realistic physics engine. Did I mention PUPPIES?

name: Rose & Camellia 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Rose & Camellia 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Rose & Camellia 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Mortal Kombat 1: One-Time Dragon Pack
description: This pack grants a one-time purchase of 850 Dragon Krystals plus an exclusive Scorpion dragon palette with alternate! Use your Dragon Krystals in the Premium Shop in Mortal Kombat 1 to purchase other amazing palettes and gear. This killer deal is available once per account.

name: One Piece: Starboard
description: An RPG Maker MZ adventure game inspired by the One Piece series, set 20 years after the events of the original story. Take control of Alphonse D. Orion, a mysterious amnesiac with a wish to see the stars of the Grand Line.

name: Running Pet
description:
Welcome to Running Pet, the endless running game! Jump, slide, and dodge various obstacles to pick up gold coins on the road . An exciting adventure is calling you!

Our pet pal Sunny Cat and his friends want to build a dream home. Can you help them? Use gold coins to buy more furniture to decorate their home! Unlock Buck, Luna, Bao, Jack, and George by building rooms.

Collect skateboard pieces, unlock unique abilities, and skating on city streets. Explore the subway, jungle and more areas, push your limits in mystical realms, and take on thrilling challenges in a variety of landscapes.

Challenging daily tasks and unlock wonderful areas. Jump into the adventure and play now!

name: War Thunder: USS Arkansas Pack
War Thunder: K9 VIDAR Pack
The Legend of Nayuta: Boundless Trails - Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition includes:
- The Deluxe Edition of the game
- "Starfall Symphonies" 2-disc Original Soundtrack
- "Endless Horizons" Hardcover Art Book
- "Nayuta & Noi" Acrylic Figure
- "Creha's Cradle" Bookmark
- "Realms Beyond" Lenticular Sleeve & Collector's Box

name: The Legend of Nayuta: Boundless Trails - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
- The game
- Digital Soundtrack
- Mini-Art Book

name: Fibrilis
description: What would you do if you were forced out of your still life into a dying world of tangled patterns?

name: Drakheir
description:
An evil dragon has emerged, plunging the world into chaos. But have no fear, a valiant hero is needed, and that hero could be YOU! Dive into a mystical journey as Drakheir calls upon you!
In this exciting adventure, your hands become powerful weapons – forget those controllers, as you wield magic with your very fingertips! Embark on a mission to rescue the world, and conquer adversaries in an epic quest. Explore enchanting realms, master magical skills, and rise to the occasion through countless challenges and adventures.

name: Burst Space
description: Embark on a pixelated adventure in "Burst Space". As you equip yourself with the perfect weapon, engage in intense battles with horrible monsters, hone your skills to defeat enemies and collect Einherjar Warriors.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Invasions - Season of The Spectre
description: Invasions is a dynamic single player campaign with a variety of distinct challenges. With built in progression and RPG mechanics, mixed with MK1’s incredible fighting action, Invasions provides deep, and engaging challenges, and a ton of rewards along the way.

name: Mortal Kombat 1
description: It’s In Our Blood! Discover a reborn Mortal Kombat Universe created by the Fire God Liu Kang. Mortal Kombat 1 ushers in a new era of the iconic franchise with a new fighting system, game modes, and fatalities!

name: Lakefront Restaurant
description: Lakefront Restaurant is a short experimental horror game that takes gameplay events and randomizes them leaving the player to question what's going to happen next without it impacting the story or gameplay.

name: Bumper Stickers Archipelago Edition
description:
The basic concept is simple. You're given a Bumper in the bottom-right. Click on one of the Launchers surrounding the field to launch the Bumper into it. It'll first move in the direction launched, then bump into a wall or another Bumper and start moving in the direction on the Bumper itself. Match three of the same colour horizontally or vertically to clear them off.

But wait, there's more! This version also plugs into Archipelago Multiworld, so you can try a whole new challenge with your friends!

name: Pixel Paint 2: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Netflix Stories: Love Is Blind
description:
A new season of "Love Is Blind" is in flight! It's your turn to find love, romance and drama in the pods. Customize your character, choose your story and take a shot at true love in this interactive story game based on the hit series.

You're the newest contestant on "Love Is Blind." Try the social experiment for yourself and date several mystery suitors in pursuit of true love. Choose your story and decide: Is love really blind?

Customize your character before you step into the famous "Love Is Blind" pods on your journey toward love and romance. Choose your outfit, makeup, hair style and more!

From your first "Love Is Blind" date to a romantic engagement, your love story depends on your choices in this interactive story game. Will you choose to meet as many love interests as possible? Or will you spend your time building deeper connections on dates and turn up the romance?

Just like in "Love Is Blind" the show, the journey to love in this interactive game will have plenty of dramatic twists and turns. Will you help people get together? Or sabotage a relationship in the name of true love? Influence the decisions of your castmates through your choices, and watch the juicy drama unfold.

name: Ghost Detective
description:
You’re a detective who’s been killed on the job. Now as a ghost, your mission is clear: Find hidden objects and solve puzzles to catch your own murderer.
Experience a new hidden object murder mystery crime game set in haunted New Orleans — where life's never boring and dying can get downright complicated.
As a ghost detective, it's up to you to conduct a crime investigation by collecting important clues, looking for hidden objects and solving puzzles. Team up with valuable allies — both living and dead — to solve the mystery of who murdered you... and why.

name: From Below Pocket
description:
From the deepest trenches of the ocean, the Kraken has come!

As the Kraken climbs the walls of your fortress, repel it by hurtling blocks down at the monster. As lines are cleared, the Kraken will retreat, but only momentarily.

Can you survive the night, and live to fight another day?

Compatible with all Game Boy models, and enhanced for the Super Game Boy!

Featuring Two-Player simultaneous play!

name: Tales of Arise: Beyond the Dawn - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Beyond the Dawn Deluxe Edition includes:
• Tales of Arise
• Beyond the Dawn Expansion
• Classic Characters Costume & Arranged BGM Pack
• Premium Travel Pack
• Starter Pack

Wield the Blazing Sword and join a mysterious, untouchable girl to fight your oppressors.

description:

The Beyond the Dawn Ultimate Edition includes:

Wield the Blazing Sword and join a mysterious, untouchable girl to fight your oppressors.

name: Spooky Bundle: From Shadow & Apocalipsis
description: Feel the spooky atmosphere in two sinister games: From Shadows and Apocalipsis!

name: Magic Math
description:
A fun math game for one or two players for our beloved C64!

This game was heavily inspired by a Playstation game.

Your player grid has a value, indicated by the dots. Pick up numbers adding or subtracting to or from your value. Never go below 0 or above 9.
In case you are overwhelmed you can trigger one of three bombs by keeping the fire button pushed for a second.

Too easy for you? Go insane with a second player in coop or versus modes!

Can you enter the highscore table?

name: Cardfight!!: Rare Card Set 14 [D-BT09] - Dragontree Invasion
description: One of set of each SP version card.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Saluda Grade Scenario Pack 01
description: Experience the challenges, the history, and the splendor of Norfolk Southern railroading in the Blue Ridge Mountains - with Saluda Grade Scenario Pack 01 for Train Simulator Classic!

name: Trail Out: Steel Wheels
description: Create chaos on multi-wheeled vehicles with extra features!

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws: Pack - Variety Pack 11
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Clashmon: Ignition
description: Clashmon: Ignition is a Free to Play, Collectible Battle RPG, playable in any PC or Mobile Browser.

name: Planet Zoo: Oceania Pack
description: All aboard, set sail for the Planet Zoo: Oceania Pack! Explore breathtaking archipelagos and experience the beauty and culture of the continent's sun-kissed Pacific islands.

name: Petty's Adventure: Volcano
description: Petty's Adventure: Volcano is a colorful game with changing gravity in which you have collect crystals to complete a level.

name: Last Chance in Xollywood: Special Edition
description: This content requires the base game Last Chance in Xollywood on Steam in order to play.

name: Real Drift Multiplayer 2
description: Real Drift Multiplayer 2 offers a unique experience waiting for drift enthusiasts! Experience a real racing simulator with customizable vehicles, competitive online modes, and realistic drift dynamics.

name: Infinite Country
description: Weird Q-bomb RPG, bloody and realistic and realistic, Built-in homemade drama editor, 2D horizontal backroom stage play...

name: Autocraft
description: Autocraft is a game where you will be playing as a mighty Dwarf that can collect loot.. as well as enchant his shield with bonus gems found around.

name: Axembler
description: Axembler is a collection of single-level games developed in a single application.

name: Farming Simulator 22: OXBO Pack
description: Upgrade your fleet of machinery and enjoy specialty harvesting and application technology by the internationally renowned manufacturer Oxbo.

name: Cadde
description: Are you ready to let it rip in the streets of İstanbul? Cadde combines fun physics, realistic sound design and the atmospheric air of İstanbul.

name: BlooDooMoon Survivor
description: Welcome to this survival sandbox game! Your plane made a forced landing during the Bermuda storm. You will need to establish your own survival base from scratch, collect materials, make tools, build towns, manufacture weapons, explore unknown fields. Will you conquer the challenges?

name: The Sentinel
description: Defend your castle against waves of invaders in 'The Sentinel,' a tower defense game. Strategically upgrade weapons and defenses, make tough choices, and immerse yourself in intense battles. Will you triumph and protect your realm?

name: Stellario
description: In a large star field, the Spirit flies around and absorbs stars to build up mass and take on a different appearance. But you have to be careful on the journey - there are black holes scattered around the field, and also spaceships flying at unthinkable speeds.

name: Little Monkey King's Big Quest
description: Welcome to "Little Monkey King's Big Quest"! Exciting adventures await you alongside the Little Monkey King.

name: Survival on a Deserted Island
description: The players of 'Survival on a deserted island' are immersed in a challenging and adventurous desert island. We need to constantly explore islands, find resources to manage our hunger, thirst, and physical strength, and build shelters to resist the threat of terrifying skeletons wandering around.

name: Mahjick: The Realm Taker
description: "Mahjick - The Realm Taker" is a turn-based strategy game combining Roguelike and Mahjong Elements. Embark into this epic journey of taking the throne and to become the Keeper by defeating enemies for Enchantments and Skills, and Ronning your tiles for Attribute and Talent skills.

name: Gem
description: This is a 2D science fiction casual game, where players can gain increasingly fulfillment by collecting and exploring in the universe. The non-competitive game mode can also bring relaxation to users.

name: Secret of the Vikings 2: The World Tree
description: Inexplicable disasters haunt the Vikings. Help Valkyrie Fenja and Raven Yorin rebuild the destroyed village and find out what is behind the mysterious events.

name: Slime Alchemist
description: Turn-based tactics and roguelike deckbuilding with a twist! Forge your path across a procedural overworld, spend time as a resource to play cards, and build your deck from the techniques of vanquished foes. Hone your strategy and become the greatest slime of all!

name: Burger Shop 3
description: Make tasty food items to serve hungry customers in this fast-paced sequel to the amazing food making games Burger Shop 1 & 2!

name: Robospital
description: Become a doctor in Robospital and fix robots. Learn programming, write code, and test your code. With vibrant graphics, coding challenges, and a narrative, embark on an undercover mission. Dive into a game where coding meets adventure!

name: Wormhole: Battle for Planet Earth
description: Wormhole: Battle for Planet Earth - This is a fantastic third-person action game. In the game you are waiting for aliens, teleporters, dark matter and hurricane action.

name: Golf Evolution Simulation
description: 30 Main stunt missions, 15 Parking missions, a fun test course map and a complete all-in-one game with all golf carts and modifiability. A different experience with a mix of Arcade and Simulation.

name: Persha and the Magic Labyrinth: Arabian Nyaights
description:
Cats and magic take centre stage!?
New experience!? Puzzle battle RPG!!

name: OA Family
description: OA Family, a game with learning and relaxation. The main system of the game is to bring the popular English vocabulary game Hangman to do in a player-friendly format with a helper.

name: Sun-Rise.exe
description: Adventure through bizarre and intricately made levels in this 2D platformer game.

name: Waking Up: Way Back Home
description: A child infiltrates a spaceship to carry out a secret rescue mission. His objective is compromised when they must make a forced landing on a strange planet. Explore this mysterious place, overcome obstacles, and find the way back home!

name: Depthris
description: Depthris is a 3D puzzle game inspired by the classic BlockOut game for DOS. Move and rotate the pieces almost anywhere (except backwards) and aim for the highest score.

name: Puzzle Game
description: Jump into the puzzle-solving action of The "Puzzle Game" and discover what Grandpa left for you.

name: Trapped In Here With Me
description: Trapped In Here With Me is a lightning fast arcade action game. Grind for the top score among your friends, or globally.

name: Bit.Trip Rerunner
description: Rerunner defines rhythm gaming, combining nostalgia with innovative mechanics and a fresh art style, making it a must-play experience for gamers of all backgrounds.

name: Unloop
description: Unloop is an elegant, relaxing puzzle game about using clever mechanics to connect and remove portals.

name: Penrose
description:
"A strange thrumming then, not in the air or ears. Sensed dully in a way that I'd never felt before..."

Penrose is a non-linear narrative by doublespeak games. Scroll forwards and backwards through an ever-changing story. Manipulate the environment, explore every possibility, and unravel the mystery at the heart of everything...

name: Cum Clicker
description: Do you ever fantasize about having a lot of cum? Yes? Well this is your chance! Click cum, collect cum, upgrade cum. Be patient and you will have all the cum you can ever ask for!

name: Dere Vengeance
description:
Unleash your fears in a fourth-wall-breaking platformer that will leave you questioning allegiances... and reality itself.

Let the hauntingly atmospheric soundtrack and meticulously designed pixel art engulf you in paranormal encounters, impossible glitches, psychological horror, and the nostalgia of classic side-scrolling games.

Enjoy the guidance of A.I.D.E. and a very kind and morally right "Dev," who'll be there to assist players every step of the way. The companions also help give an eerie charm to the surreal experience of playing this unique game. Players also encounter eccentric characters, scary creatures, and unsettling corruptions along their journey.

Experience terror as you navigate nightmarish yet fair platforming challenges with precision and dread. The old-school hard gameplay is reminiscent of classic games that are hard to put down, preparing the brain for the kind of scares that make most analog horror media effective.

Dive into thrilling meta-horror that defies the boundaries of the creepypasta digital horror genre, blending fear and suspense into a truly surreal experience. In DERE Vengeance, the player is part of the story.

Embrace the perfect blend of nightmare and adventure in this story-rich platformer that promises genuine scares and enjoyable gameplay. You can embark on DERE Vengeance without playing our other games, though not advisable, as this terrifying adventure stands on its own with a unique and intriguing experience.

name: Zombie Sanctuary: Ash
description: This is a fun 3D mowing magic battle game. Very decompression, press a few keys, move the mouse can feel a pleasant game experience.

name: Oberty
description: Oberty is minimal shape-blending puzzle game where you XOR-blending simple geometric shapes to make a beautiful complex target shape.

name: Rose & Camellia Collection
description: The graceful, beautiful, and elegant slap battle of the historied Tsubakikoji ladies has emerged. Your swipe becomes the face slap to your foes!

name: Vinterget
description: Brave the mountain in this short platformer. Use your axe as a grappling tool to skillfully swing across multiple challenging levels. Fight through the perils of the snowy mountain of Vinterget.

name: Mortal Kombat 1
description: A new era has begun. It's In Our Blood. Discover a reborn Mortal Kombat Universe created by Fire God Liu Kang. Mortal Kombat 1 ushers in a new era of the iconic franchise with a new fighting system, game modes, and Fatalities!

name: Monsters Idle RPG
description: Explore the world of Arcadius - a place filled with many types of mythical creatures - manage your creatures, items, capital, other resources and capture all creatures by battling in diverse biomes and places.

name: Stack World
description: Stack World is a physics puzzle game. Place all the given blocks and make sure they do not fall off the screen before the countdown timer hits 0. Enjoy over 100 levels of gameplay and use the level editor to create your own levels. Compete for the fastest times on the leaderboards.

name: Persha and the Magic Puzzle: Arabian Nyaights
description: Persha and the Magic Puzzle is a new kind of puzzle RPG that combines 3-match puzzle and dungeon RPG. Control the main character "Persha," a young girl, to solve the mysteries of the tower and catch your nemesis "Rock"!

name: Dragonheir: Silent Gods
description:
Authentic Dungeon Adventurous RPG Strategy Game

Dragonheir: Silent Gods is an open-world RPG that puts you in control of over 200 heroes. In this game, you'll experience strategic combat like never before, where every move counts and every decision could be the difference between victory and defeat. The multiverse concept allows you to travel through different worlds, exploring endless wonders and surprises.

name: Defiled
description: Slay the night creatures and save the church, you are the last hope! Defiled is a time survival medieval game with rogue-lite elements, where you choose your character's path and slay hundreds of enemies on your way.

name: Last Chance in Xollywood
description: You are an extraterrestrial movie director at a low-budget movie studio. In this visual novel/RPG, you'll struggle against capitalism, corruption, and your eccentric coworkers to get the movie done on time and under budget.

name: Spirited Thief
description: Scout, loot, and get out in Spirited Thief, a tactical turn-based stealth game with a twist. Search ahead as spirit, Trin, and grab the goods as thief, Elaj. Just make sure you have the loot before the guards come looking!

name: Goldenjar Fall
description: An ARPG game, intensely full of fantasy

name: Caster's Trap
description: Enter the vanishing cabin and discover its secrets and its magic, while avoiding its ghastly entities.

name: Mall Craze
description: Build, Customize, and Manage your very own mall! Construct shops, restaurants, fitness center, or movie theater. Hire staff, fulfill customer‘s needs, advertise your mall, research new products, and set better prices to grow your mall. Master these and become a tycoon giant!

name: 1 Agile Altercation
description: 1 Agile Altercation is the sequel to 1 Fast Fight, there's two major differences this time though; 90 Minutes of mapping time instead of the previous 60 minutes and there's a full 32 new maps this time around from various mappers such as Meowgi, Master Medi, Spendoragon, Petyan, Phoenyx and TheLoneliness.

name: Hexcodle
description: A Wordle clone game with hex codes. Challenge your color instincts and decode the hexcode.

name: Guilty Loving Boxing
description: A 3D boxing game featuring female! You can also play mixed gender matches! In addition to choosing characters and rules and fighting, you can also watch CPU vs CPU or train without being counterattacked! Enjoy boxing in various costumes and situations! *Note: This is a single-player game only.

name: Army of Tactics
description: Embark on an exhilarating journey through the world of Army of Tactics, where strategy and fortune blend into the best mobile game experience. Free to download and thrilling to play, your saga begins on mystical islands, with every battle a step towards glory!

name: Hungry Hearts Diner: Memories
description: The 4th game in the Hungry Hearts Diner series and a prequel that takes place early in the Diner's history. Granny is joined by her husband Gramps to serve food to their neighbourhood in their diner and via the deliveries mechanic, with new patrons and a few familiar cameos.

name: Grisly Grottos
description: 10 speedmaps + start map inspired by e1m4 - The Grisly Grotto. Mappers had 60 hours to create a map using custom progs - based on Copper and featuring the diving gear from Dwell - with no restrictions on texturing or gameplay other than the prompt.

name: Grokit
description:
Grokit is a hand tracking multiplayer mixed reality game aimed at rapid fire interactions. Inspired by WarioWare and Mario Party, players are dropped into bizarre situations where they must evaluate their environment and act in a short amount of time.

This game can be played in your own room with mixed reality passthrough on all Meta Quest headsets or in traditional virtual reality in a variety of handcrafted environments.

name: Venturous in the Footsteps of the Fallen
description: Drawing inspiration from Indianan Jones, Tomb Raider and The Mummy, Venturous is a Doom total conversion mod that follows an Indy-esque adventurer on an epic adventure. It takes place in the 1930’s and sees you on the trail of Nazis who are attempting to unlock the gate to the fabled city of Atlantis. You will explore ancient ruins in Mesoamerica and Egypt while also battling Nazis and mythical monsters.

name: Starfield Digipick-Locking Minigame Simulator
description: This is a recreation of the lock-picking "digipick" minigame from Bethesda's Starfield. Bethesda games always have great lockpicking minigames for some reason and Starfield is no exception to that rule.

name: Retro Bowl College
description:
The official spin-off of the smash hit Retro Bowl takes you back to the old-school. If you thought managing a pro team was a challenge - you've seen nothing yet!

Make a name for yourself as a winning head coach for one of 250 college teams. Manage tight budgets and encourage your hotheaded young players to keep their eye on the ball when they're surrounded by the temptations and distractions of college life. Can you tell the difference between the next pro football superstar and the party animal who doesn't know when to quit? Can you foster their talents and help them make the draft? Can you turn your school into the greatest football college of all time?

name: Nightfall
description: A singleplayer map made for the GZDoom port. Mouselook is recommended, but not required.

name: State of Decay 2: Curveball Update
description:
How do you meaningfully add to a game that’s been in players’ hands for five years? In the case of State of Decay 2, you throw a curveball. Although this is the 34th update for State of Decay 2, Curveball represents a significant overhaul. This new update, coming to players for free on September 18, is a landmark moment for the game – not just offering a swathe of new content for the game’s most dedicated players and newcomers alike, but marking a new era in State of Decay 2’s development through the work of Wushu Studios.

Wushu, from Liverpool, England, will continue providing support to State of Decay 2 as much of original studio Undead Labs transitions to work on the next entry in the series – but where you might expect that support to be incremental, Wushu is making a very big splash. Curveball is a major update, touching almost every element of the game, and designed to consistently offer brand new challenges, even to those who have been playing State of Decay 2 since release.

Available after the fifth in-game day, curveballs can change the world around your settlement in some very interesting ways. Housed in a new menu, curveballs will periodically appear – each with their own narrative attached – offering new objectives, rewards, enemy types and much more. Curveballs can be positive (like finding increased loot) or negative (like buffing regular zombies in multiple ways); they can be timed or objective based; they can affect enemies, your survivors, or other NPCs. Effectively, any element of the game you may have gotten comfortable with can, and often will, change.

name: Fortress Defense
description: 'Fortress Defense' is a cartoon style defense game. Players can summon archers and upgrade to different roles to block the enemy's attack.

name: Highway Getway
description: "Highway Getway" is a car parkour type game. The player controls a car to drive on the highway. There is a lot of game money on the road. The player can get the game money when he controls the car.

name: Shadows of the Past
description: Shadows of the past is a visual novel for adults only. In a small town, private detective Josh Wilson leads a quiet and measured life, solving small problems for the locals. But everything changes when Ellie shows up on his office doorstep....

name: Tax Evasion
description: An action filled roguelike, where you climb the floors of the IRS headquarters to reclaim what is rightfully yours... Your money. Take down your enemies. Buy items with their money. And climb the floors. Unlock new characters and abilities to approach this office building in many different ways.

name: Shipping Manager
description: Create and manage your own shipping empire. Control every aspect from route creation to marketing to staff handling and beat other managers to top the leaderboards.

name: Naturpark Lillebælt VR
description: Dive into VR missions at Naturpark Lillebælt. Plant eelgrass, catch fish, clean trash, and learn about biodiversity. Restore the ocean's balance in this educational adventure!

name: Castle of Void
description: Your main goal is to defend the castle, because the enemies will stop at nothing. Do not let them break through the defense, as their ambition is to capture your fortress and gain power over your kingdom.

name: Dr. Lunatic Supreme With Steam
description: Smash monsters, collect brains, and so much more as you attempt to stop Dr. Lunatic's evil scheme. 1,200 levels and hundreds of hidden bonuses in Bouapha's greatest adventure! Now enhanced for Steam!

name: Eldritch Exterminators
description: Face the Eldritch hordes. You are a possessed gun, feeding on the souls of the dead. Grow your power and challenge the Eldritch Gods for Dominion over the Void. Slay the Forgotten Ones and harness Unspeakables in this Bullet Heaven, and escape the ties that bind.

name: Fantasy Monster Clicker
description: Are you bored? Then step into the world of Fantasy Monster Clicker! Enjoy and explore a world full of upgrades, levels, monsters and bosses.

name: The Third Age
description: Magical SLG Masterpiece Real Strategy & Exclusive Heroes Together into Battle.

name: Car Mechanic: City Driving
description: Customize your own car and go on a serene ride through the city streets!

name: Omega Tower
description: Omega Tower is a small tower defense game mixed with rogue-lite elements! Pick a loadout with unique abilities, Upgrades for your towers, and create unique synergies. But most importantly, try to defend your core!

name: Cars, Girls and Rock 'n' Roll
description: Sunset Racer is an immersive racing game that transports players to the golden era of automobiles, where powerful cars with full tanks of gasoline raced into the sunset.

name: Meat Veterans
description: Check out a free-to-play online action game! Test your shooting abilities in individual and team battles against your opponent. Stand out by creating your own strategy and distinctive style with unique skins and items, and especially - by taking the top place in the global ranking.

name: Time Survivors: Chapter 0
description: Chapter 0 for Time Survivors, the Most Historically Inaccurate Roguelike ever. Slay hordes of minions as Lincoln, Tesla, Cleopatra and other historic heroes with new unique abilities! Collect resources, unlock and enhance gameplay through our tree-based metaprogression. Forge your own epic journey

name: Sagres
description:
In 'Sagres', the player becomes a Portuguese explorer in 1480 and sets out to find the whereabouts of his missing father.

You will travel around the world collecting information and discover forgotten civilizations, myths, and ruins in the process. As you explore, you can sail, fight, and mini-games, recruit characters from all over the world as your companions, and customize your own ships.

name: Case 03: True Cannibal Boy
description: A short anti-classic JRPG. Step into the roles of a handsome moneygrubber and a female psychopath as they take on an exorcism job that pits them against the evil spirit they were destined to face... (This game will have support for English.)

name: Polyfury
description: Polyfury is an intense bullet hell with a circular twist and a minimalistic visual style. Seven Deadly Shapes will push your abilities to the edge with a barrage of bullets and lasers as you freely orbit around the arena with the analog stick.

name: HumanitZ
description: HumanitZ is a co-op, top-down, open world survival game in a world ended by the zombie outbreak. As one of the few human survivors, try to last as long as “humanly” possible. The past can’t be changed, but you can make a difference today and for the future of humanity.

name: Lies of P
description: Inspired by the familiar story of Pinocchio, Lies of P is an action souls-like game set in a dark Belle Époque world. Guide Pinocchio on his unrelenting journey to become human.

name: How to Hack in?
description: Enter a virtual world of hacking with this real-life hacking simulator. Every choice you make will tailor a unique outcome. The possibilities are endless - if you know how to do it.

name: After Hours
description:
You're a tired, stressed new employee at Freddy Fazbear's Mega Pizzaplex.

Lucky you has the oh-so enviable task of fixing up the generators within the Pizzaplex's Superstar Daycare, since some genius made a mess of them. While you do this, you befriend the daycare's attendants and get to know them on a deeper level as things happen all around you.

name: My Cute, Pure Boyfriend 2
description:
In this interactive romance otome game, you are the one in control of the romantic story!

You have several options on how the story will unfold.
Immerse yourself in an enchanted game of your choice.

name: Lamprey
description:
Fang couldn't be happier about her new job at the prestigious tech startup Riverstone, Inc. When she starts on her new team, building a revolutionary workplace assistant AI called Lamprey, she jumps into her work head-first.

However, it's not long before things start going wrong, with a software bug causing Lamprey to trap the team in their office. Will Fang and her co-workers be able to escape a prison of their own making?

name: Metroid: Crocomire's Last Stand
description:
METROID: CROCOMIRE’s LAST STAND is Roebloz’s second Metroid: Zero Mission hack, this time starring the X parasite mimic SA-X in an alternate timeline where Samus encountered an X instead of The Baby at the end of Metroid II: Return of Samus, taking down the last of the Space Pirates for complete galactic domination of the X!

The hack redesigns the whole map and has quite a few new tilesets, (Mostly from Super Metroid and Metroid Fusion) granting a brand-new experience that feels quite close to Super Metroid. The goal is to terminate Crocomire in the Dissolvery, which is locked behind 4 Security Locks, (Similar to Fusion) however one unique thing that this ROM hack does it that you have a great choice of which order you want to do things in. You could get Space Jump before even touching the Varia Suit, get the Plasma Beam as your second beam upgrade, everything is possible if you’re clever enough.

The major items also move around during a “CORE-X” playthrough, (This game’s equivalent to Hard Mode) granting even greater replay value, especially to get those nice ending pictures. And yes indeed, the player sprites have been changed to those of the SA-X from Fusion, making the hack the second one to ever have custom Samus graphics in Zero Mission. The length of the hack is pretty short, (Around 2 hours) but going through all the endings and exploring the different paths of every difficulty could more than quadruple that. A full map is included with the download, with two different styles (And two different ones to reflect the changes in Hard Mode)

There are also other various ASM tweaks thanks to the talented ASM hackers of Metroid Construction, such as the Crocomire final boss being very close to Super Metroid’s, and the Fusion beams being ported back into Zero Mission.

So if you are looking for a refreshing Zero Mission hack with a Super Metroid vibe, this hack is for you!

name: Deltarune: Rouxls Kaard
description: Witness the Duke of Puzzles, the Crafty Box-Maker, the... Lesser Dad? Fight in a battle of wit and unfair advantages readily given to your opponent, thee Rouxls Kaard. Puzzling jukes, jabs, and jars are sure to trip you up so keep your head (and your HP) high whilst combat commenceth.

name: Flipping Two Minutes
