description: Embark on journey through the "Project: Artificial Legacy Saga" a four-part series, crafted to feel as if it was released across four console generations. Follow Kirana on her heroic journey, as she protects her family and her homeland from a mysterious evil force.

name: Adventure Apple Robots
description: Help the hero to find out why his brother is always running away, explore this fantastic world and unlock new skills as he ventures.

name: Grey Area
description: A tough platformer following an 8-year-old diving over, under, and around the terrifying creatures living in a strange, mysterious world that's so much bigger than her: the "world between all worlds".

name: Blood Strike
description: Charge into fast paced combat in modes such as Battle Royale, Squad Fight or Hot Zone alone or with friends. Blood Strike offers a wide range of playable Strikers, each with a unique active and passive ability letting you deploy drones, shield walls and everything in between. Customize your weapons to your liking and get ready to prove that you have what it takes to come out on top!

name: No Sun To Worship
description: Sneak into enemy bases, rescue hostages, hack computers and play your own way while you uncover a conspiracy to unearth unspeakable horrors. Stick to the shadows and stop an ancient curse in this mission-based stealth adventure!

name: Paranormal VHS
description: Paranormal VHS is a horror game that features a VHS tape-inspired aesthetic. The game's story revolves around a popular vlogger who spends a night in haunted locations in search of paranormal activity.

name: New Super Mario World 1: The Twelve Magic Orbs - Powered-Up
description: A remake of New Super Mario World 1: The Twelve Magic Orbs which aims to polish the original hack by improving the level design and giving more replay value.

name: Boti: Byteland Overclocked
description: Jump, Dash, Collect! Play solo and with your friends and loved ones! Explore this cute 3D platformer where you play as Boti, a brave and adorable data bot. Join Boti on an adventure to save the cyber-world of Byteland from bugs and viruses!

name: Mage Lords of Brams
description: Mage Lords of Brams is a "bullet heaven"/"reverse bullet hell" roguelite. Slaughter countless fantasy enemies with your powerful spells, powers and artifacts while gathering research scrolls to improve future runs inbetween levels. Thousands of race/class/item combinations allow for endless variety.

name: Pep-Pel
description: Run through each level as Pep-Pel! a goofy red goblin thing. In this beautifully hand drawn game. play through tons of fast-paced and difficult levels, each with there own challenge to master!

name: Silent Seeker
description: Silent Seeker is a "Hide & Seek" multiplayer game. Play in the clutches of the hunter to find the props hidden in the map! Or Play as a prop and hide from the hunter!

name: Super Brawl Rush
description: Super Brawl Rush is a boss rush beat'em up set in the scorched post-apocalyptic lands of the near future. Choose your champion and fight your way between swarms of bloodthirsty thugs, mutants and cultists.

name: Furry Shades of Gay 3: Still Gayer
description: Furry Shades of Gay 3 gets even steamier and funnier with new stories, new characters and new features! Go through all the branches and see new, longer animations with more varied poses, and for the first time in the series, voice acting!

name: Scarlet Maiden
description: Join Scarlet, the last remaining Maiden of the Sacred Flame, in her sinful quest to defeat the Prime Evil. Explore the randomly generated dungeons of the Underworld, learn new abilities, equip Scarlet with powerful equipment, and engage in lewd activities along the way.

name: The Backrooms: Survival
description: The Backrooms: Survival mixes survival horror with roguelike elements. Explore randomly generated levels with different items and entities while trying to maintain your thirst, hunger, and sanity.

name: Alder Forge
description: Play as the Five Members of the Fourth Squadron and battle your foes using the game Adaptive Turn-Based Combat System, shape your own path in a story-driven game with a handcrafted world and unique characters.

name: Rogue Card
description: Rogue Card is a roguelike deck builder, where every run is unique and strategy matters. Set in a randomized fantasy world, where tactical decisions affect the outcome of your whole game.

name: Another Crusade
description:
The spiritual successor of a super RPG and its seven stars. A timed-battle role playing game where timing and strategy is all!

Another Crusade gathers the gameplay mechanics of Super Mario RPG. Timed-battle commands and exploration as a platformer are part of the game.

The game is currently on a kickstarter and is set to be published on Q4 2021.

name: Summun Aeterna
description: Summum Aeterna is a fast-paced Roguelite inspired by the Metroidvania Aeterna Noctis. Create your own worlds, challenges, difficulty and influences in each new run. Die, learn, become stronger, and achieve victory. Death is inevitable, but glory is only for the chosen.

name: Nunya
description:
You play as Nunya, a nun that lives in town that is on top of a dungeon full of mysteries.
Use the elevators to explore the dungeon and find the treasures hidden inside. But be careful, the dungeon is full of monsters.

name: Arclight City
description: Embark on a thrilling journey through a sprawling metropolis teeming with neon-lit streets, clandestine corporations, and an underworld shrouded in mystery. Arclight City combines the allure of retro text-based graphics with captivating modern pixel art, delivering a truly unique visual experience.

name: Little Dungeon Renovator
description: Sin descripción

name: Life's Too Short GB: A Christmas Spirit
description: An enhanced version of the Playdate classic, now for Game Boys! Explore the mansion, meet various spooky characters and solve simple puzzles.

name: Slime Trials
description: A fast paced, swinging action, precision platformer.

name: Wreck League
description:
Wreck League reigns as an unrivaled battleground, where the most powerful mechs you can create clash with others’ fighters in an unforgiving competition of skill and dominance. Build your mech, sharpen your abilities in training mode, then face the ultimate challenge in scheduled TOURNAMENTS and EVENTS against other mech owners across the globe. Rise to supremacy and unlock prized on-chain rewards.

Unleash your mechs in real-time player-versus-player combat. With seamless cross-play functionality, the action transcends devices, allowing you to compete on mobile, PC, or Mac.

Unleash powerful moves by deploying your loadout of action cards, which manifests randomly in battle. Each action costs a different amount of energy to execute, so manage your loadout accordingly–with strategic timing, you can inflict devastating combo attacks.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Cutting Dreams at Dawn
description:
Version 6.9 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Miracle Magical Girl
• New Story Chapter XL: Seven Karma Phala
• New Captainverse Event: After the Blood Moon Fades
• New Promare Collaboration
• ...and more!

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Yamato's Grand Tour Logbook & Soul Map 1
description: Yamato takes Oden's logbook as his personal bible. Set out with him on his own grand tour across various stages!

name: Sky Islands
description:
Switch between 2D and 3D! Sky Islands is a charming platformer game where you embark on a captivating journey through a fantastic sky realm. Inspired by the beloved FEZ game, prepare to shift between the 2D and 3D dimensions to collect hidden stars and clear all the levels.

It is a mobile port of the browser game Sky Island.

name: Motorsport Manager 4
description: Motorsport Manager 4 takes the race team strategy game to a whole new level of excitement and control. Embark on an exhilarating journey as you build your very own motorsport team from the ground up, leaving no decision unmade. This is your chance to shape the future of racing.

name: Bingo
description: Dive into the captivating realm of Bingo! Venture into the pulsating Bingo Arena where every moment is charged with thrill and expectation.

name: Ouija: They are Among us
description: Five young people unleash dark secrets through a Ouija board, challenging their perception of reality and blurring the line between legends and fiction.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 & Revhead
description:
Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 is new production with well settled player base. Start as a fresh owner of a car garage and work your way to service empire. Get your hands dirty in highly realistic simulation game with great attention to details. Get ready to work on 4000+ unique parts and over 72 cars. Roll up your sleeves and immerse yourself into highly realistic garage environment.
Expand your range of services by investing in new work space and equipment. Repair, fix, test, paint, tune and rebuild cars. Pay a visit to a new Auction house and buy cars in various condition. If feeling lucky you can try it out at barns. Some of them may contain hidden gems - if you can find them.

Revhead is a car racing simulation game, where you have to build your own race car.
You have a friend Charlie, who is busy with building race cars. He would need some help from you and he invites you to Australia. You start your journey somewhere in a small town in Australia, where the only way to get recognised if you are able to build the fastest and best racing car around. You have Charlie, his expertise and his garage. The rest is up to you!

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Ultimate Edition
description: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 is the latest evolution of Pirate Warriors action! Based on the concept of 'experiencing a real One Piece battlefield,' buildings will come crashing down during the action and attacks will throw up smoke and dust, placing you in the thick of the One Piece world!

name: Construction Simulator: SANY Pack
description:
Looking for new heavy construction machines to expand your company? Check out the SANY Pack with its 15 brand-new machines from the renowned Chinese manufacturer SANY covering different fields of application. Be prepared for any challenges that may arise on the construction site!

• SANY STR130C-8S – Vibratory Asphalt Compactor
• SANY SSR120C-8 – Vibratory Single Drum Soil Compactor
• SANY SY305C LC – Medium Hydraulic Excavator
• SANY SY500H (Tier 4F) – Large Hydraulic Excavator
• SANY SY155W – Wheeled Hydraulic Excavator
• SANY SYL956H5 – Wheel Loader
• SANY SMG200C-8 – Motor Grader
• SANY SAP60C-8 – Asphalt Paver
• SANY SRT45 – Articulated Dump Truck
• SANY SAC1300T2 – Small Mobile Crane
• SANY SAC4500 – Large Mobile Crane
• SANY SCM2000C-8 – Cold Planer
• SANY SR155 – Rotary Drilling Rig
• SANY SY35U (Tier 4i) – Compact Excavator
• SANY SFT100 – Tower Crane

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - The Battle of Onigashima Pack
description: This exciting fourth character pack brings three more playable characters to the game! Enjoy even more intense Pirate Warriors action by controlling three characters key to the climax of the Land of Wano arc!

name: Super Mega Baseball 4: Castillo Arena Stadium
description: Perched high above the waves, a centuries-old fort stands guard over an epic stadium known as Castillo Arena. But as players smash dingers over the historic ramparts and the fans yell their battle cries, the real battle is waged on the diamond.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Additional Episodes Pack
description: Obtain Additional Episodes Pack for use with One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pack: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate - Psychedelic
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: F-Zero 99
description:
A battle royale game featuring tracks from the original F-Zero for Super Nintendo Entertainment System.

Line up with 98 other F-Zero machines and race to the finish in this thrilling take on the original Super NES game. Keep an eye on your power meter as you boost and bash, because speed is just as important as survival. Defend yourself with a Spin Attack and collect Super Sparks to breeze past the competition on the elevated Skyway.

Outpace and outlive your opponents in rotating modes

The core F-Zero 99 mode is just one way to race at breakneck speeds. Mini Prix and Grand Prix modes appear on a set schedule and challenge you to compete and qualify in a series of races. Team Battle and the extra-tough Pro Tracks mode rotate throughout the day. Prepare yourself in Practice Mode and race against your ghost.

name: We Were Here Expeditions: The FriendShip
description: Partner up with your friend online and test your friendship by solving puzzles together in an abandoned amusement park. Work together to overcome brain-teasing challenges in this standalone We Were Here experience.

name: Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles: The Great Battle
description: The leaders of every nation have raced to apply new technologies to their armaments industries, equipping their militaries with terrifying weapons of doom and destruction. War, they say, is inevitable.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Megami Ibunroku Persona: Iku no Tou-hen
description: Escape from the other dimensional space ruled by demons. Another story of the Persona users.

name: Maimai DX Buddies
description: The fifth release of the "maimai DX" series, featuring enhanced 2 player modes and more.

name: Crime Boss: Rockay City - Dragon's Gold Cup
description: Travis Baker (Michael Madsen), a distrustful and spiteful gangster, joins forces with his rival, Dollar Dragon (Danny Trejo) in the first Expansion Pack of Crime Boss: Rockay City. Steal the King's gold and establish your legacy as the next Crime Boss.

name: Arcade Archives: Jail Break
description:
Emergency!
Keep the citizens safe from the prison escapees!

name: Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles: Samurai Clans
description: Revolution is afoot in the land of the rising sun. The shogun’s power is fading fast, while rival warlords muster their troops as they plot their ascent to the throne.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Jean-Claude Van Damme Skin
description: A playable skin for Johnny Cage, inspired by the legendary martial artist Jean-Claude Van Damme.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Shang Tsung
description:
Play as the powerful sorcerer Shang Tsung.

included as a pre-order bonus for the game and available 5 days early with the Premium or Kollector's Edition of the game.

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - When Shadows Dance
description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary Weapons, and one Legendary consumable: Hayalî (Legendary Hunter), Karagöz (Legendary Springfield 1866) , Hacivat (Legendary Scottfield Model 3 Swift) & Lamba (Legendary Alert Trip Mine)

name: DNF Duel: DLC 2 - Brawler
description: 'Brawler' can be used in DNF Duel.

name: Teocida + Estigma
description: Enter the surrealistic horror world of Teocida+Estigma!

name: Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles: Airships & Aviators
description: Only the bravest dare to take to the skies, borne aloft in experimental flying contraptions. More sensible folk look up in awe at the soaring machines, wondering which will be next to come crashing back down to earth...

name: Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles: The Wild West
description: Life beyond the frontier can be a dangerous endeavour. The few brave sheriffs responsible for law and order are hard-pressed to keep track of the banditry and vice that runs rife in these territories.

name: Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles: Arctic Realms
description: Using the latest steam technology, the hardy inhabitants of the northern lands have found ingenious ways to survive and thrive in the frozen wastes. Travellers to the region must face snowstorms, avalanches and even greater perils.

name: Bunny Bond
description: Bunny Bond is a steamy visual novel where you can chat, flirt, and fall in love with 6 handsome guys! Enjoy fun interactions with the group, send DMs to whoever catches your eye, and collect all of the sexy pictures they send to you!

name: IronWolf: Free Non-VR Edition
description: This is the Free Non-VR version of IronWolf VR. A co-op submarine game with a light touch on realism, making the submarine sim genre accessible to a wider audience.

name: The Hardest Game Ever
description: The Hardest Game Ever is a precision 2D platformer. As the name suggests, it's a very difficult game, so difficult that the developer has created a challenge to pay the first person to beat the game.

name: Karting Superstars
description: Karting Superstars is a charming racing game that captures the exciting and competitive world of karting. Inspired to condense the thrill and beauty of racing, we've dedicated our love, time, and craft into this new game that builds on the celebrated simcade taste of Circuit Superstars.

name: Yummy Jewels
description: Go on a candy puzzle adventure.

name: All Noobs Must Die
description: A place where wishes come true! You just need to protect the obsidian portal from zombies. Mine resources with your pickaxe, build traps, and put them to use — let them grind the zombies into a juicy green porridge! Funny meme endings!

name: Idol vs Furries
description: Survive to Furries, and Farm Skins, in stylized gunfights.

name: Clarent Saga: Mana Chapter 0
description: A short RPG with great action battles, graphics and music inspired by the Mana Series.A great entry point for newcomers!

name: Color Splash: Birds
description: Color Splash: Birds is a charming and relaxing puzzle game that will lift your spirits and take You into the world of adorable birds and art. Venture into the gallery, where you will find many extraordinary and colorful birds paintings.

name: Dungeons and Female Teachers
description: As a female teacher, you found a crack leading to a different world in the classroom. You entered the different world through the crack. You found that there are many dangerous creatures in the different world. In order to protect the school from being invaded, you decided to destroy these monsters.

name: Just the Two of Us
description: Just the Two of Us is a 3DCG visual novel made using the Ren'py about the budding feelings between a boy and a girl that meet for the first time in a post-apocalyptic world. A story-rich game with plot twists and multiple endings

name: Go for a Punch! Saki Sanobashi
description: Four students find themselves trapped in the restroom of an abandoned school; the door is locked, and there's no way out except to cling to hope or face death.

name: Obesity Simulator
description: Obesity Simulator boils down to "eating smart", you are at the mercy of your own choices ....... and maybe also the food flying straight at you. Eat to survive, but be wary of what and how much you eat.

name: HotDog TD
description: This is an awesome Tower Defense game that you need to protect the world from Alien 's invasion.

name: Fishman's Last Stand
description: Brace yourself for a fight ahead, as humans set their sights on your land. Their unwavering determination fuels their pursuit, and they'll stop at nothing to claim it. Stand your ground with unwavering resolve, knowing that your defense holds the key to safeguarding your territory

name: Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Dive into a world of Victorian elegance and mechanical marvels. Discover steam-powered wonders while testing the limits of your puzzle-solving skills.

name: This is My Place
description: This is my place - This is a fantasy war game with simple gameplay but difficult survival. Players need to upgrade facilities to obtain more resources to defend their territory. In addition to wars, players can also gain more resources or morale by playing mini-games. So how many days can you last?

name: To The Mars
description: Are you ready to climb Mars just for fun? This is a concise game, nothing more. You can always repeat it, you learn from mistakes. It should be simple enough, good luck to everyone.

name: Rainbow
description: Who are you. Where is this place. Find the secret in a rainbow-colored, monochrome world. Maybe this is all someone's dream.

name: Kaikan
description: Kaikan is a vertical scrolling shooter that focuses on destroying enemies. Destroy enemies with 6 types of aircraft with different performance, clear 5 stages, and aim for a higher score.

name: Train Simulator: Glasgow to Dunblane and Alloa Route
description: Experience the charm of Scotland and scenic diverse landscapes as you explore Glasgow to Dunblane and Alloa for Train Simulator from Thomson Interactive.

name: Crossroad of Worlds: Star Riddle Collector's Edition
description: Continue your detective journey and stop the star thefts! There is no peace for the magical stars of the worlds. Draw out all of the secrets from a captured villain and find the true mastermind behind the vile conspiracy!

name: Enraged Red Ogre
description:
In a faraway land, the yokai are suddenly rising and running out of control. A small human village is in danger, but Akaoni, a short-tempered red ogre that lives in it, is going on a rampage to defeat the yokai!

Run, jump and BASH as you travel around a mystique land based on old Japan eras with beautiful pixelart, exploring 9 different zones searching for relics that change the world around you with new paths.

name: Silent Paws: Hidden Valley
description: Embark on a tranquil journey through the mesmerizing landscapes of the Hidden Valley as you take on the role of a graceful fox in this enchanting walking simulator.

name: William's Dad's Secret
description: You can't sleep at night. There's something trying to get into your room and you don't know what it is. You must do whatever is possible to stop it.

name: Franzen
description: Franzen is a turn-based RPG set in a dystopian-steampunk world. Explore themes of empathy and politics as Franz and Lefsa Dellia work to uncover the truth of "The Scream". Meet a cast of colorful characters and fight bizarre creatures in your journey through the world of Branzen!

name: Mugen Souls Double Pack
description: Experience both cult classic JRPGs with content true to the Japanese originals!

name: Puppeteer: Control
description: Puppet Master Simulator. Become the Puppet Master and find exhibits for your toy house hells collection.

name: Collecstar
description: Shoot for the stars! In this cute 2D platform arcade game, jump on clouds and collect as many stars as you can before you run out of lives.

name: Hospital
description: This game is an action horror game that can be cleared by collecting cursed boxes in the hospital while escaping from ghosts. Various strange phenomena occur in the hospital. Collect cursed boxes and escape from the ghosts that roam the hospital.

name: Andromeda
description: In this casual sci-fi side scrolling space shooter, you are the last human and decide to make a final trip to the Andromeda galaxy before saying your final goodbye to the universe. Conquer enemies, experience the story, and find out what awaits you in Andromeda.

name: Labyrinth
description: The aMAZEing Labyrinth now with a completely new look and at long last for PC: for more than 35 years, the simple and unique gameplay of the board game has inspired more than 20 million people worldwide.

name: Defendron
description: Defendron is an epic, acion-packed, cyberpunk/futuristic themed tower defense with unique twist on upgrade path. Place towers, fend of huge enemy waves and emerge victorious!

name: The Walking Dead: Betrayal
description: Betray your friends in this 5-8 person game of cooperation and social deception set in the universe of The Walking Dead. Work together to survive, but trust no one! Traitors have so many ways to sabotage the team, the walkers are the most predictable threat.

name: Office Affairs
description: Office Affairs is an immersive visual novel game that takes players on an exciting journey through the complex world of office romance. Navigate through a thrilling web of love, ambition, and personal growth as you juggle multiple love interests and strive for success in the professional realm.

name: Strongblade: Match 3 Puzzle and Match-3 Adventure
description: Strongblade is a match-3 puzzle game where you play as Sean the Mouse. Travel through a captivating world filled with puzzles, outsmart cunning villains, befriend charming animals, and build unique camps.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Kombat Pack
description: The Kombat Pack will feature a Johnny Cage character skin with the likeness of famed actor and martial artist, Jean-Claude Van Damme. It also provides early access to six new playable characters with Omni-Man (Invincible), Quan Chi, Peacemaker (DC Peacemaker), Ermac, Homelander (The Boys) and Takahashi Takeda along with the five additional Kameo Fighters Tremor, Mavado, Janet Cage, Ferra and Khameleon.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Kollector's Edition
description:
The Kollector's Edition is a physically only release for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S at select retailers. It includes all Premium Edition content, along with a 16.5-inch Liu Kang sculpture designed by COARSE and an inspired Liu Kang in-game character skin, three exclusive art prints, a steel case, and 1,450 additional Dragon Krystals (2,700 total).

The Premium Edition includes the Kombat Pack, early access to the game beginning Sept. 14, and 1,250 Dragon Krystals (in-game currency).
The Kombat Pack will feature a Johnny Cage character skin with the likeness of famed actor and martial artist, Jean-Claude Van Damme (available at launch), early access to six new playable characters (available post-launch), and five new Kameo Fighters (available post-launch)

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Premium Edition
description:
The Premium Edition includes the Kombat Pack, early access to the game beginning Sept. 14, and 1,250 Dragon Krystals (in-game currency).

The Kombat Pack will feature a Johnny Cage character skin with the likeness of famed actor and martial artist, Jean-Claude Van Damme (available at launch), early access to six new playable characters (available post-launch), and five new Kameo Fighters (available post-launch)

name: Monster Hunter Now
description: Monster Hunter Now is an AR mobile spin-off of Capcom's Monster Hunter series. Developed by Niantic (responsible for Pokemon GO), it lets the player hunt monsters in the real world.

name: Inspector Gadget: Mad Time Party
description: Go Go Gadget! Become the famous Inspector Gadget and have fun with your friends in this brand-new adventure!

name: Behind the Frame: The Finest Scenery VR
description: The serene, heartwrenching tale re-imagined for VR! Guide brush strokes and solve a variety of puzzles to help an aspiring artist complete her masterpiece. As her painting starts to take shape, learn more about her brusque neighbor, pesky cat, and mysterious past!

name: Dynablaster
description: Having been a blockbuster, Dynablaster is a game for the strategic thinker whose smart tactics will instill fear in his competitors – playing online or local against others or against the computer. In this captivating action game, destroy your enemies with cleverly placed bombs.

name: Survivor Mercs
description: Lead your squad of Mercs against M.E.G.A. Corp.'s evil robot army. Fast-paced twin-stick action, frantic horde survival, tactical squad-building & lots of loot! Exploit game-breaking synergies and beat the evil billionaire bosses in ever-changing operations. Lock, load, and loot, Commander!

name: Deceit 2
description: Deceit 2 is an online social deduction horror game. Inspire fear as the Terror, play detective as the Innocent, or create mayhem as the Cursed. Trapped with friends and strangers: who can you trust to help you escape?

name: Isekai Rondo
description:
Sho, a young man who spends his days in an exploitative company in modern Japan, is reincarnated into a parallel universe as Shaw, due to an accident!
While the job given in his new life is 'Unemployed' and hardships continue with a bad luck party, one day he acquires the ultimate job as a Sage, suddenly becoming the strongest with ultra rare passive skills!
Aiming for the long-awaited mellow life he finds himself in a battle to defeat the Overlord after meeting the Hero Viola.
With exceptional passive skills that for example can change the future by returning before Game Over, get rid of enemies in turn-based battles by summoning spirits or managing mana plants, or even use the skills of monsters!
Complete quests and raise the guild rank so you can challenge deeper dungeon or other adventuring parties, too! With other elements such as a battle arena and the dungeon where treasure chests are automatically generated, your adventure against the Overlord's Army will surely be an unparalleled quest to finally gain a calm, modest life!

name: Sugar Shack
description: Sugar Shack is a maple syrup management game and world crafter set in a cozy, magical forest inspired by Quebec lore and art. Hungry villagers with endless sweet tooths make their way to this legendary shack. Grab some friends, fire up the boiler, and let the syrup flow!

name: Baten Kaitos I & II HD Remaster
description: Two RPG masterpieces return. Originally released for the Nintendo GameCube, Baten Kaitos: Eternal Wings and the Lost Ocean and Baten Kaitos Origins are back with improved graphics and new features to aid game progression, making them even more accessible for new players.

name: Baten Kaitos Origins
description: Players will have the opportunity to discover or rediscover the emotional journeys of the Baten Kaitos series, which features distinct card-based RPG systems that allow for split-second decisions that edge participants closer to victory. Players will take the role of a Guardian Spirit, guiding each game’s protagonist and their companions through their journey.

name: Baten Kaitos: Eternal Wings and the Lost Ocean
description: Players will have the opportunity to discover or rediscover the emotional journeys of the Baten Kaitos series, which features distinct card-based RPG systems that allow for split-second decisions that edge participants closer to victory. Players will take the role of a Guardian Spirit, guiding each game’s protagonist and their companions through their journey.

name: Painter Simulator
description: Painter Simulator is a new generation game in which the emphasis is placed on the player's imagination and perceptiveness. Create the world in the colors you want to see with a brush.

name: The Crew: Motorfest
description: Welcome to Motorfest! Join a one-of-a-kind festival and enjoy the best experiences car culture has to offer in a beautiful Hawaiian open world.

name: Movafort
description: Movafort is the world’s first time travel open world game, where you can travel to the future or the past to change the timeline without limits. Paradoxes will find you when it comes to bring items from the past with you.

name: Monastery
description: Monastery is a challenging turn-based card game with roguelike elements. The witchplague-ridden Shardhunters universe expands. This time, we follow the fate of a lone survivor seeking refuge from the horrors of the land in a ruined monastery on top of the mountains.

name: Katana Rama
description: A mobility based, fast paced action game where you play as a hacker program, with the mission of breaking out of a digital security system. Coming to Steam 2022.
